str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To look at attentively, gaze at, consider. From ana and theoreo; to look again at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
An object of worship or veneration. From sebazomai; something adored, i.e. An object of worship.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
An altar, platform; a slightly-elevated spot. From the base of basis; properly, a stand, i.e. an altar.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To write upon, inscribe, imprint a mark on. From epi and grapho; to inscribe.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be dutiful, pious, show piety towards, worship. From eusebes; to be pious, i.e. to worship, or to respect.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To do not know, be ignorant of, sometimes with the idea of willful ignorance.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To declare openly, proclaim, preach, laud, celebrate. From kata and the base of aggelos; to proclaim, promulgate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
